package.name: gimmie
package.summary: Adding Gimmie rewards to Magento and allow user earn points and get real rewards when purchasing and referral friends.
package.description:
# Gimmie Magento Plugins
Adding Gimmie rewards to Magento and allow user earn points and get real rewards when purchasing and referral friends.
# Features
- Set reward country for filter rewards available in country or auto detect from user IP address. - Show/Hide Gimmie view when embed in site. - Enable/Disable events that you want to give out points in settings. - Give out points base on amount that user purchase when user commit transaction.
# How to insert gimmie view to Magento
On theme design, add link or button to menu with `gm-view="catalog"` or class name `.gm-open-catalog`.
